title: Il-Mithna
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, International, Western, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Has a veg section on menu which includes spaghetti with sun-dried tomatoes, garlic and olives, local rose wine. Vegan options may be limited. Make sure you let the staff know you are vegetarian. Restaurant building is an old windmill with terraces. May have little or no vegan options. Vegans please inquire and inform HappyCow. Previously located on Main St, Sep 2015.
